results.name: a(n) = difference between Jacobi-first-non-one(24n+1) and Jacobi-first-non-one(24n-1).
comment: The definition of Jacobi-first-non-one is given in A112056.
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4096
xref: A112081(n) = a(n)/2. A112082 gives the points where a(n) is zero. A112059 gives the nonzero terms.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 27 2005
